features.name: Authentication System

features.name: Match Management

features.name: Live Scoring System

features.name: Player Selection
features.description: Batsman and bowler selection interfaces for match scoring

features.name: Toss Management
features.description: Toss decision interface for match initialization

features.name: Scorecard Display
features.description: Match scorecard view showing detailed match statistics and ball-by-ball history

features.name: Leaderboard
features.description: Display team and player leaderboards with aggregated statistics

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: User dashboard displaying match overview, recent matches, and quick actions

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Landing page with marketing content, live matches display, and navigation

features.name: Real-time Updates
features.description: Live match updates broadcasting using Pusher for real-time communication

features.name: Database Models
features.description: MongoDB data models for users, matches, and teams

features.name: API Utilities

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with React and TailwindCSS

features.name: Type Definitions
